name: Ducky (The_Dj)
description:
Ducky is a platformer about a duck/beetle/spider (the original image is the top screen shot)

This is my first game and I am 10 Years old.  There are 10 levels, 3 enemies and some "things"

FRIENDS  These are some friends you'll meet along the way:    lv1 platform: these are your platforms. They fly and never betray you.

  ???:  I know what they are but that's Matpats job sorry. You'll see these when it's game over!

ENEMIES  These are the foes of ducky:

   Skash: These monsters stole ducky's land and will not give it back. They can fly! Bet ya didn't see that coming!

  Sliceplants: These are immortal but because of coding skills they only kill if you touch red the slicing parts. The green leaves are fine.

  lv2 platform: These rainbow-up-top-devil-down-low platforms do not kill you but they are not platforms at all! Just your mind.

???   ???: This is the final boss So please help ducky.
